label: 海人
本: Commerce and Finance in the Middle Ages: The Beginnings of 'Capitalism'. ACTA ASIATICA, 81 . The Tōhō Gakkai . 2001-09
説明文: hyakusho (lit. 'sea people') who were engaged in fishing and salt-making, and they used boats to barter the marine products and salt that resulted from their endeavours.
